alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 3:03AM MST until February 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills ongoing. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Fort Collins, Greeley, Byers, and Southern Lincoln County. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County
